entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 8:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: NNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Fog. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Fog. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
